name: IOTimerDispatchSource
desc: A dispatch source that notifies your driver at a specific time.

items.name: + Create
items.desc: Creates and configures a timer dispatch object.

items.name: - init
items.desc: Handles the basic initialization of the dispatch source.

items.name: - free
items.desc: Performs any final cleanup for the timer dispatch source.

items.name: - SetHandler
items.desc: Sets the handler block to run when the timer fires.

items.name: - WakeAtTime
items.desc: Schedules a callback from the timer.

items.name: - Cancel
items.desc: Cancels all callbacks from the event source.

items.name: - TimerOccurred
items.desc: Executes custom code when the timer fires.
